name: 50 First Date Questions
description:
50 First Date Questions is Here! Have you ever had trouble starting a conversation on a first date because you were nervous? 50 First Date Questions makes it easy by making it into a fun game while really getting to know the person and their personality. Find out what makes them interesting, find out what you have in common and find out how fun they can be.

Gameplay:
- Player 1 ask a question and Player 2 answers it. Then Player 2 gets the phone and ask a new question to Player 1. Repeat till the game is done and have fun!
- You get to Skip 2 questions per game, but they go back into the deck so it'll be answered by one of you by the end of the game.

Ads:
This game does contain ads however you can remove them by paying a onetime fee of $0.99 to remove them.


Make the most of your first date and download this game now!
